Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Application
      • ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.framework.Application

  • public class Application
extends Application
    Serves as a Service Locator (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Service_locator_pattern). Source: http://stackoverflow.com/a/5114361/14064 (2015-03-15)
